name: Airbird - Streamer
description:
Play streamer in Safari or Firefox now.

"The easiest way to describe Streamer is to say it's a sublime trip through an infinite lake, where a floating avatar traverses endlessly through a colorful landscape. But, it's a little deeper than that..."

-Killscreen

Another interactive music video experience for Airbird, aka Joel Ford's, latest release. This time playing around with the infinite runner genre with a changing camera angles. More at Driftless Recordings.

This game makes use of packages and plug ins created by Keijiro Takahashi.
